name: HOOKED (jf1x)
description:
HOOKED is a game about solitude, peacefulness, and cleaning trash from the ocean with a magic hook. Join our hero on a day just like any other... or is it?

Made for https://itch.io/jam/miz-jam-1 with the wonderful virtual console TIC-80.

Includes, with permission, some modified code from VIZA's PSLIB tool. Thank you VIZA!

Visit HOOKED on TIC-80's catalogue

Changelog

2020-08-22: Performance update. Game should no longer lag as you get closer to the end.
